live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37813.summary: Some customers in the Dog Creek area of Williams Lake are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37813.title: May 27 – Williams Lake (Dog Creek) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
